20110104090337.000|20110104090337.000|CC1|     BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS

20110104090343.000|20110104090343.000|CC1|   OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES

20110104090344.000|20110104090346.000|CC1|     OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.

20110104090346.000|20110104090348.000|CC1|        SUICIDAL THOUGHTS       
20110104090348.000|20110104090348.000|CC1|    AND BEHAVIORS IN CHILDREN,  
20110104090348.000|20110104090350.000|CC1|     TEENS AND YOUNG ADULTS.    
20110104090350.000|20110104090350.000|CC1|     PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED    
20110104090350.000|20110104090352.000|CC1|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.     
20110104090352.000|20110104090354.000|CC1| DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20110104090354.000|20110104090354.000|CC1|          TAKING PRISTIQ        
20110104090354.000|20110104090357.000|CC1|    WITH NSAID PAIN RELIEVERS,  
20110104090357.000|20110104090357.000|CC1|   ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS   
20110104090357.000|20110104090359.000|CC1|   MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.  
20110104090359.000|20110104090359.000|CC1|         TELL YOUR DOCTOR       
20110104090359.000|20110104090402.000|CC1|   ABOUT ALL YOUR MEDICATIONS,  
20110104090402.000|20110104090403.000|CC1|  INCLUDING THOSE FOR MIGRAINE, 
20110104090403.000|20110104090403.000|CC1|      TO AVOID A POTENTIALLY    
20110104090403.000|20110104090405.000|CC1|   LIFE-THREATENING CONDITION.  
20110104090405.000|20110104090405.000|CC1|   PRISTIQ MAY CAUSE OR WORSEN  
20110104090405.000|20110104090407.000|CC1|       HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE,     
20110104090407.000|20110104090409.000|CC1|  HIGH CHOLESTEROL, OR GLAUCOMA.
